title: Candy Bubble Shooter 2017 Download
text: Play Candy Bubble Shooter for FREE - 1000 levels of epic bubble popping fun.Indulge your sweet tooth and get addicted to this sugary cute Match 3 game - free of any calories! Candy Bubble Shooter features 1000 challenging levels of bubble popping fun for all ages!Match at least three candy bubbles of the same color to burst them and remove them from the field. A classic Connect 3 formula. Try to drop big bubble clusters to earn delicious bonus points and complete the level's goal to move forward. Can you earn all three stars? It's a real Puzzle Bubble experience. Bubble Pop at its best.Candy Bubble Shooter features:- 1000 sweet and super addictive levels will keep you playing for hours- beautiful, mouth-watering graphics- various challenging level tasks to complete- bubble swap function which allows you to switch between two bubbles you can shoot-playable in landscape and portrait mode- FREE Bubble Shooter
